interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Dungeons & Divas! Normies Gone Nerdy! " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Prepare for Battle! " .

progression.synopsis: In the next contest, Yasu and Miku tested each other's intelligence and erudition. But as everybody have soon discovered, Miku was not too smart, and Yasu was too smart for her own good. Thus, the both have fought relentlessly for more than an hour, until everybody got tired of this. Eventually, Yasu answered one of the simple questions about members of the class, resulting in her victory. First Floor 1:2 Second Floor.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.48.0.

navigation.next_event: Sweet Joy Befall Thee! Be Nice to Sensei Battle!
